content: rainbow bee amigurumi pattern by a little love everyday this pdf pattern for rainbow bee is written in us crochet terms and available in english skill level easy/ intermediate the pattern requires basic crochet knowledge you should be familiar with - magic_ring - single_crochet - increase - decrease - slip_stitch - changing colours materials you will need - sport weight cotton yarn in yellow green blue lavender pink peach and white colour - 2 mm crochet hook or the size you need depending on yarn you use - polyester stuffing - 8 mm safety eyes - tapestry needle - black embroidery thread size the finished doll measures around 2 8 inches wide and 2 8 inches tall you are welcome to use any yarn of different thickness the sizes may vary according to the yarn and hook you use hope you will enjoy crocheting this cute little bee as much as i did please note this is an ad-free pdf version with step by step pictures of pattern that can be found for free on my blog to view the free version go to www paintitcolorful blogspot com >> this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to share publish resell distribute or rewrite this pattern in any way >> you may sell items made from this pattern but please give me a credit as the designer and include a link to this pattern
